autonomous_agent_apis.name: OpenAI Assistants API
autonomous_agent_apis.description: OpenAI's API for building AI assistants within applications, providing tools like code interpreter and file search.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Microsoft Bot Framework API
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Microsoft's API platform for building, connecting, and managing intelligent bots across multiple channels.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Google Dialogflow API
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Google's API for creating conversational interfaces such as chatbots and voice-powered apps.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Amazon Lex API
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Amazon's API for building conversational chatbots using voice and text, integrated with AWS services.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Rasa Open Source API
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Open source HTTP API for building and managing conversational AI assistants and chatbots.
